metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30333 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: RARLAB UnRAR before 6.12 on Linux and UNIX allows directory traversal to write to files during an extract (aka unpack) operation, as demonstrated by creating a ~/.ssh/authorized_keys file. NOTE: WinRAR and Android RAR are unaffected.

notes.Note: sbeattie> per debian, unrar 6.12 corresponds to source version 6.1.7

criterions.comment: libclamunrar package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
rar package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
unrar-nonfree package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
